directions.step:
Fill a bottle or jar loosely with fresh basil sprigs and 5 cloves of peeled garlic. Use white wine vinegar. Place on windowsill to brew for 2 weeks. Great served on freshly sliced tomatoes, Excellent for stir frying vegetables and good for marinating vegetbles overnight (use carrots, cucumbers, squash and green peppers).
EAT-L Digest 25 July 96
